text:
- So you're in Chengdu and
you don't know what to do,
come with me I'll show ya.

So one of the best places
you can come here in Chengdu
is the Wenshuyuan Buddhist temple.

This place is the most
well-preserved Buddhist temple

in Chengdu, and it's full of
tons of cool stuff to see.
It's old, built in the Tang Dynasty.
It's got a huge garden complex.
You can walk around here for hours.

It's a great place to come,
walk around and relax.

So we're going to go for
a walk and check it out.
So the park within Wenshuyuan

really is a great place to
come here for the afternoon.
It's got that really nice relaxed feel.
I can't think of a better place to come.
Whether you're a local or a traveler,
Wenshuyuan is on the top of the list
for things to do in Chengdu.
(speaking foreign language)

I was super lucky, I
befriended a local monk
who wanted to show me around
and explain some points about the temple.
Well you heard him.

The Wenshuyuan temple is
a must visit in Chengdu.

Not only is the temple
complex full of sights, art
and free vegetarian food.
Districts around the temple
is another attraction on its own.

There's a food street
with countless snacks
and local specialities.

I recommend the sweet and
spice Tian shui mian noodles,

found directly across the
street from the temple.
Getting here is super easy.

Just take subway line one
to Wenshuyuan station,
get off at exit K, take a left
and then walk until you find the gate
to the temple complex on your right.
You can't miss it.

So now when you're in Chengdu,
you got something to do.

I'm just so happy that
you guys are watching

these videos, and today
I'm really that I got
that awesome tour from that monk
that I just met randomly.
It was just such a nice coincidence.

Thanks again for watching,
check back every week

cause I got videos
coming out all the time.
(Chinese singing)
